oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Growing a milk quality stream in practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Meadows, Phil
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: milk quality
milking equipment analysis,
National Mastitis Council
veterinarian
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The elimination of milk equipment analysis by Dairy Farmers of Ontario left a void for this service. With a dairy farm background and interest in milk quality services, this speaker added a milk quality consultation service to his veterinary practice. For this endeavor to be successful, include the herd veterinarian and a milk equipment company representative in the action plan to improve milk quality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2019; 304-305
